channel.title: Cant get pi client to run
channel.description:
i can get the pi source to run but when i try to run the client, it tells me it cant find the Jframe. I am using the original pi if that matters.
[IMG]http://i1210.photobucket.com/albums/cc403/blakethesnake2/clientcompile.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1210.photobucket.com/albums/cc403/blakethesnake2/clientrun.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1210.photobucket.com/albums/cc403/blakethesnake2/clientrunning.jpg[/img]

item.title: Cant get pi client to run
item.dc:creator: @ppvagina ppvagina
item.description:
@ppvagina wrote:

try this this is mine
@echo off
Title Client
cd ./Class/
START java -Xmx300m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32
exit

Read full topic
item.source: Cant get pi client to run
